column1: #Text=There 's a way you can help him .
#Text=" Katara says : " Please , there 's no one around to see you .
#Text=" Katara says : " It was so brave of Haru to use his earthbending to help that old man .
#Text=" Aang says : " You must have really inspired him .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Everyone should get some sleep , we 're leaving at dawn .
#Text=Ca n't we sleep in for once ?
#Text=This village is crawling with Fire Nation troops .
#Text=If they discover you 're here , Aang , we 'll be eating fireballs for breakfast .
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'd rather eat fireballs than nuts .
#Text=" Katara says : " The old man turned him in to the Fire Nation - it 's all my fault - I forced him into earthbending !
#Text=" Katara says : " Haru 's mother said they came for him at midnight .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Then it 's too late to track him , he 's long gone .
#Text=" Katara says : " We do n't need to track him .
#Text=The Fire Nation is going to take me right to Haru .
#Text=" Aang says : " And ... why would they do that ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Because they 're going to arrest me for earthbending .
